hospital_cover.description: Highest hospital access level stated on public sources.

plan_tier.description: Internal tier classification (not necessarily provider wording).

semi_private_room.description: Semi-private room benefit stated (may be conditional).

private_room.description: Private room benefit stated (may be conditional).

outpatient_cover.description: Outpatient benefits present (limits not captured here).

gp_visits.description: GP visit refund/benefit present (limits not captured).

maternity_waiting_months.description: Waiting period in months as stated/standard.

excess_amount_text.description: Text field describing excess logic (no pricing engine data).

notes: Populate source_url with the direct public plan page or PDF.
Do not scrape premiums from quote engines; allow user to enter budget as preference if desired.
